# physics.flu-dyn [[Back]](#toc)

### [299] [Natural Convection Heat Transfer from an Inclined Cylinder](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.06019)
*Aubrey G. Jaffer,Martin S. Jaffer*

Main category: physics.flu-dyn

TL;DR: 提出预测倾斜圆柱体自然对流传热的新公式，基于几何参数和流体特性，在多个数据集上验证误差较小


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有倾斜圆柱体自然对流传热预测方法可能不够精确或适用范围有限，需要开发更准确、通用的预测公式

Method: 推导新的预测公式，考虑圆柱体长度、直径、倾斜角度、Rayleigh数、Prandtl数和热导率等参数，使用93个实验数据进行验证

Result: 公式在9个数据集上验证，长度直径比范围1.48-104，均方根相对误差在1.6%-4.7%之间，表现良好

Conclusion: 新公式能准确预测倾斜圆柱体自然对流传热，为工程应用提供可靠工具

Abstract: This investigation derives a novel formula predicting the natural convective heat transfer from an inclined cylinder given its length, diameter, inclination angle, Rayleigh number, and the fluid's Prandtl number and thermal conductivity.
  The present formula was tested with 93 inclined cylinder measurements having length-to-diameter ratios between 1.48 and 104 in nine data-sets from three peer-reviewed studies, yielding (data-set) root-mean-squared relative error values between 1.6% and 4.7%.

</details>


### [300] [Multi-resolution Physics-Aware Recurrent Convolutional Neural Network for Complex Flows](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.06031)
*Xinlun Cheng,Joseph Choi,H. S. Udaykumar,Stephen Baek*

Main category: physics.flu-dyn

TL;DR: MRPARCv2是一个多分辨率物理感知循环卷积神经网络，通过嵌入平流-扩散-反应方程结构和多分辨率架构来建模复杂流动，相比单分辨率基线在精度和效率上都有显著提升。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统单分辨率模型难以有效捕捉复杂流动中的多尺度动态，需要开发能够嵌入物理方程结构并利用多分辨率架构的模型来提高流动模拟的准确性和效率。

Method: 提出MRPARCv2模型，嵌入平流-扩散-反应方程结构，采用多分辨率架构，包括分层离散化和跨分辨率特征通信机制，使用更少的可训练参数实现更好的性能。

Result: 在2D湍流辐射层数据集上评估，相比单分辨率基线，在方差缩放均方根误差和物理驱动指标（湍流动能谱、质量-温度分布）上都有显著改进。尽管参数减少30%，但滚动预测误差提升50%，谱误差提升86%。

Conclusion: 多分辨率归纳偏置对捕捉多尺度流动动态具有优势，但缺乏状态方程的物理约束会导致精度下降。未来物理信息机器学习模型需要嵌入状态方程知识以增强物理保真度。

Abstract: We present MRPARCv2, Multi-resolution Physics-Aware Recurrent Convolutional Neural Network, designed to model complex flows by embedding the structure of advection-diffusion-reaction equations and leveraging a multi-resolution architecture. MRPARCv2 introduces hierarchical discretization and cross-resolution feature communication to improve the accuracy and efficiency of flow simulations. We evaluate the model on a challenging 2D turbulent radiative layer dataset from The Well multi-physics benchmark repository and demonstrate significant improvements when compared to the single resolution baseline model, in both Variance Scaled Root Mean Squared Error and physics-driven metrics, including turbulent kinetic energy spectra and mass-temperature distributions. Despite having 30% fewer trainable parameters, MRPARCv2 outperforms its predecessor by up to 50% in roll-out prediction error and 86% in spectral error. A preliminary study on uncertainty quantification was performed, and we also analyzed the model's performance under different levels of abstractions of the flow, specifically on sampling subsets of field variables. We find that the absence of physical constraints on the equation of state (EOS) in the network architecture leads to degraded accuracy. A variable substitution experiment confirms that this issue persists regardless of which physical quantity is predicted directly. Our findings highlight the advantages of multi-resolution inductive bias for capturing multi-scale flow dynamics and suggest the need for future PIML models to embed EOS knowledge to enhance physical fidelity.

</details>


### [301] [From Time Series Expansion to Proper Generalized Decomposition via Graph-Theoretical Connection: Stabilized Simulation of Fluids Flow](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.06047)
*Ahmad Deeb,Vladimir Parezanovic,Denys Dutykh*

Main category: physics.flu-dyn

TL;DR: 本文使用图论连接时间序列展开(TSE)和适当广义分解(PGD)方法，通过有向图分析简化Volterra型递归关系，揭示自然稳定化过程，并应用于Navier-Stokes方程模拟。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 建立TSE和PGD方法之间的理论联系，利用图论简化复杂的递归关系，揭示计算过程中的自然稳定化机制，并开发适用于Navier-Stokes方程的稳定化系数。

Method: 使用有向图理论分析TSE和PGD方法的空间模态计算，将复杂的Volterra型卷积递归关系简化为简单的路径遍历形式。提出简化PGD(SPGD)方法，选择时间多项式基函数，进一步简化递归关系。将方法扩展到Navier-Stokes方程，构建依赖于雷诺数、空间模态秩和时间步长的稳定化系数。

Result: 成功建立了TSE、STSE、SPGD和PGD方法之间的图论联系，显著降低了计算复杂度。揭示了计算空间模态时的自然稳定化过程，并自动推导出稳定化系数。在Re=5000的钝体尾流模拟中验证了STSE和SPGD方法的有效性。

Conclusion: 图论为连接TSE和PGD方法提供了有力工具，不仅简化了复杂的递归关系，还揭示了内在的稳定化机制。该方法成功扩展到Navier-Stokes方程，为高雷诺数流动模拟提供了有效的稳定化策略。

Abstract: In this paper, we employ graph theory to establish a connection between the Time Series Expansion (TSE) and Proper Generalized Decomposition (PGD) methods. Using the concept of a directed graph, we demonstrate how one can transition from the computation of space modes in the TSE--first illustrated for the diffusion equation--to those of space modes in PGD, in which an inhomogeneous Volterra-type convolution recurrence relation, weighted by time-dependent coefficients, appears. This recurrence relation is simplified through graph-based analysis into a compact form using a simple path traversal, reducing the computational complexity. Moreover, the compact formulation reveals a natural stabilization process in the computation of space modes, where stabilized coefficients are automatically derived and can be used in the Stabilized-TSE (STSE) framework. To explicitly construct these coefficients, we consider a Simplified PGD (SPGD) formulation in which the time modes are chosen to be the time polynomial basis $t^n$. This choice yields a one-level Volterra-type recurrence relation that is similarly simplified using a simple path representation, demonstrating a connection in the computation of space modes from TSE, through STSE and SPGD, to PGD. This graph-based connection is exhibited in the case of inviscid flow to check how crucial the addition of an artificial diffusion is in stabilizing the recurrence formula of TSE. Finally, we extend the approach to the incompressible, dimensionless Navier-Stokes (NS) equations and build stabilization coefficients that depend on the Reynolds number Re, the space mode rank, and the simulation time step. Both the STSE and SPGD approaches are tested to simulate the wake behind a bluff body at Re = 5 000.

</details>


### [302] [Reynolds effects on transition to turbulence for hypersonic expansion and compression corner flows](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.06384)
*Clément Caillaud,Mathieu Lugrin,Nicolas Severac,Sébastien Esquieu*

Main category: physics.flu-dyn

TL;DR: 实验与数值研究分析锥-柱-扩张体构型在Ma7及宽雷诺数范围内的转捩特性，区分了高雷诺数下的第二Mack模态主导转捩与低雷诺数下分离流与对流不稳定性的复杂耦合机制。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究高超声速边界层转捩及其对雷诺数和流动分离的依赖性，特别关注附着边界层和分离激波-边界层相互作用，以增进对高超声速飞行器转捩物理机制的理解。

Method: 在R2Ch风洞设施中进行实验，结合非定常壁面压力脉动测量和高速纹影成像，采用数据驱动技术分析，并与基流计算和全局线性稳定性分析进行对比。

Result: 识别出两种转捩机制：高雷诺数下由第二Mack模态及其非线性相互作用主导；低雷诺数下呈现低频与高频模态共存，首次实验测量到分离区内捕获的声波，并通过全局稳定性分析验证其线性起源。

Conclusion: 研究揭示了高超声速边界层转捩对雷诺数和流动分离的复杂依赖性，分离区内捕获的声波为低频压力特征提供了新解释，并提出了从高频到低频的能量传递机制，推动了高超声速转捩物理的理解。

Abstract: This experimental and numerical study examines transition to turbulence for a Cone-Cylinder-Flare geometry at Mach 7 and across a broad Reynolds number range. The focus is set on both attached boundary layers and separated shock-boundary layer interactions. The campaign is conducted in the R2Ch facility. Unsteady wall pressure fluctuations and high-speed schlieren images are analysed using data-driven techniques and compared with base flow computations and global linear stability analysis. The results distinguish two transition regimes. At high Reynolds numbers, transition is dominated by the second Mack mode and its non-linear interactions on the cone. High-frequency wall pressure measurements and schlieren imaging permit the capture of both fundamental waves and their non-linear harmonics. Non-linear interaction regions are resolved with unprecedented detail, clarifying the boundary-layer state before rapid breakdown at reattachment. At lower Reynolds numbers, the transition scenario is more intricate, marked by the coexistence of low- and high-frequency modes. A complex coupling between separated flow and convective instabilities is revealed, with trapped acoustic waves inside the recirculation region measured experimentally for the first time. Their linear origin is demonstrated through global stability analysis, and a simple acoustic duct model is provided to predict their frequencies. These waves offer a new interpretation of low-frequency pressure signatures and suggest a mechanism for energy transfer from high to low frequencies, ultimately driving transition on the flare. The findings advance understanding of hypersonic boundary-layer transition and its dependence on Reynolds number and flow separation.

</details>


### [303] [Model of incompressible turbulent flows via a kinetic theory](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.06433)
*Ziyang Xin,Zhaoli Guo,Hudong Chen*

Main category: physics.flu-dyn

TL;DR: 本文扩展了Chen等人提出的不可压缩湍流动力学模型，通过重新选择弛豫时间使湍流输运系数更一致，并开发了适用于壁面湍流的低雷诺数模型，验证显示该模型能准确预测平均速度、摩擦系数和雷诺应力分布。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统湍流建模方法在捕捉非平衡物理效应（如非牛顿效应）方面存在局限，而动力学理论提供了介观视角，能更自然地描述这些现象。本文旨在扩展Chen等人的动力学模型，使其更符合经典湍流理论，并能应用于壁面湍流。

Method: 1. 重新选择弛豫时间，使湍流输运系数更一致；2. 进行Chapman-Enskog分析，得到一阶线性涡粘模型和二阶非线性涡粘模型；3. 开发低雷诺数动力学模型，包含壁面阻尼效应和粘性扩散，支持粘性子层解析和壁面函数应用。

Result: 模型在平面Couette湍流中与实验和DNS数据验证，在平均速度剖面、壁面摩擦系数和雷诺应力分布方面表现出优异的一致性。首次获得了湍流动能通量的CE解，揭示了平均湍流与有限Knudsen数稀薄气体流动的相似性。

Conclusion: 该动力学模型为湍流建模提供了基于物理的基础，减少了对经验参数的依赖，能够捕捉线性涡粘模型无法描述的非牛顿效应，为湍流模拟提供了新的介观视角。

Abstract: Kinetic theory offers a promising alternative to conventional turbulence modelling by providing a mesoscopic perspective that naturally captures non-equilibrium physics such as non-Newtonian effects. In this work, we present an extension and theoretical analysis of the recent kinetic model for incompressible turbulent flows developed by Chen et al. (Atmos. 14(7), 1109, 2023), constructed for unbounded flows. The first extension is to reselect a relaxation time such that the turbulent transport coefficients are obtained more consistently and better align with well-established turbulence theory. The Chapman-Enskog (CE) analysis of the kinetic model reproduces the traditional linear eddy viscosity and gradient diffusion models for Reynolds stress and turbulent kinetic energy flux at the first order, and yields nonlinear eddy viscosity and closure models at the second order. Particularly, a previously unreported CE solution for turbulent kinetic energy flux is obtained. The second extension is to enable the model for wall-bounded turbulent flows with preserved near-wall asymptotic behaviours. This involves developing a low-Reynolds number kinetic model incorporating wall damping effects and viscous diffusion, with boundary conditions enabling both viscous sublayer resolution and wall function application. Comprehensive validation against experimental and DNS data for turbulent plane Couette flow demonstrates excellent agreement in predicting mean velocity profiles, skin friction coefficients, and Reynolds stress distributions. It reveals that an averaged turbulent flow behaves similarly to a rarefied gas flow at a finite Knudsen number, capturing non-Newtonian effects inaccessible to linear eddy viscosity models. This kinetic model provides a physics-based foundation for turbulence modelling with reduced empirical dependence.

</details>


### [304] [Characteristic Bending in Incompressible Flows](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.06455)
*Matthew Blomquist,Stéphane Gaudreault,Maxime Theillard*

Main category: physics.flu-dyn

TL;DR: 提出Characteristic Bending (CB)方法，通过体积保持投影修正特征线，消除可压缩误差，提升不可压缩流动模拟的鲁棒性和精度。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统半拉格朗日平流方法在不可压缩速度场下存在误差积累问题，包括时间积分、插值误差以及速度场不完全无散度导致的虚假可压缩误差，需要一种系统性的修正方法。

Method: 将向后时间特征重构解释为参考映射的构建，然后对该映射应用体积保持投影，将特征线"弯曲"到无散度空间，从而系统性地消除可压缩误差。

Result: 在二维和三维基准问题以及不可压缩Navier-Stokes方程控制的多相流中验证，CB方法作为传统半拉格朗日方案的替代品和参考映射公式的增强，显著提高了模拟的鲁棒性和精度。

Conclusion: CB方法为不可压缩流动模拟提供了一种通用框架，能够有效保持质量和几何特征，即使存在显著误差也能保持稳定性，是传统方法的有效改进。

Abstract: We present the Characteristic Bending (CB) method, a general framework for advecting quantities under incompressible velocity fields. The method builds on standard semi-Lagrangian advection by interpreting the backward-in-time characteristic reconstruction as the construction of a reference map, a diffeomorphism between the current and initial geometries of the advected space. From this viewpoint, the CB method applies a volume-preserving projection to the map, systematically removing spurious compressible errors arising from time integration, interpolation, or from velocity fields that are only approximately divergence-free. This projection bends the characteristics toward the divergence-free space, preserving mass and geometric features of the advected fields, even in the presence of significant error. We demonstrate the method in both two and three dimensions using benchmark problems and for multiphase flows governed by the incompressible Navier-Stokes equations. The results show that the CB method serves as a drop-in replacement for traditional semi-Lagrangian schemes and as an augmentation of reference map formulations, offering improved robustness and accuracy in incompressible flow simulations.

</details>


### [305] [A Coupled CFD Framework for Combustor Turbine Interaction in a Research Aeroengine](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.06460)
*Federico Lo Presti,Pierre Vauquelin,Jan Donndorf,Francesca di Mare,Xue-Song Bai,Christer Fureby*

Main category: physics.flu-dyn

TL;DR: 开发了MYTHOS航空发动机的全耦合燃烧室-涡轮模拟框架，用于评估可持续航空燃料和氢燃料对推进系统的影响，通过双向耦合方法捕获热斑传输及其对涡轮热负荷的影响。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 评估可持续航空燃料（SAFs）和氢燃料对下一代推进系统的影响，需要建立能够准确模拟燃烧室与涡轮相互作用的耦合仿真框架。

Method: 采用动态双向耦合方法：燃烧室使用基于压力的求解器配合详细有限速率化学反应，涡轮使用基于密度的求解器配合表格化热化学方法以提高效率。通过通量平均方法实现守恒量交换，支持任意方向流动。

Result: 耦合仿真能够捕获燃烧室产生的热斑传输及其对涡轮热负荷的影响，相比分离仿真能更好地模拟涡轮入口和叶片排间的高度非稳态温度和流动分布，叶片热负荷呈现真实的周向变化。

Conclusion: 该耦合仿真框架为研究替代燃料对核心发动机部件的影响建立了可靠基础，虽然平均气动负荷基本不变，但能准确模拟叶片热负荷的周向变化。

Abstract: This work presents a fully coupled combustor turbine simulation framework applied to the MYTHOS aeroengine, developed within the Horizon Europe project MYTHOS, aimed at assessing the impact of Sustainable Aviation Fuels (SAFs) and hydrogen on next generation propulsion systems. The numerical setup features a dynamic, bidirectional coupling between a pressure-based solver with detailed finite rate chemistry, deployed in the combustor, and a density-based turbomachinery solver employing tabulated thermochemistry for efficiency, used for the turbine. The coupling is realised through a flux-averaging methodology that ensures conservative exchange of flow quantities and allows flow in arbitrary directions across the interface. Previous validation steps of presented methodology have shown the viability of the approach and are also shortly reviewd. The paper focuses on the chemistry handling strategy that guarantees thermochemical consistency between the two solvers. Coupled reacting simulations at cruise operating conditions demonstrate the capability of the framework to capture combustor generated hot streaks transport and their influence on turbine aerothermal loading. Comparison with segregated simulations of the two components shows that coupling captures the highly unsteady temperature and flow distributions at the turbine inlet and across the blade rows. Whilst mean aerodynamic loading are essentially unchanged, a realistic circumferential variability in blade thermal loading can be observed in the coupled simulations, thus establishing a consistent foundation for future studies on the effects of alternative fuels on core engine components.

</details>


### [306] [Concentration Matters: Enhancing Particle Settling in Narrow Tilted Channels](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.06539)
*Dipankar Kundu,Florencio Balboa Usabiaga,Adolfo Vázquez-Quesada,Marco Ellero*

Main category: physics.flu-dyn

TL;DR: 研究发现倾斜通道中颗粒沉降存在浓度依赖的最优倾斜角，可用一维Brinkman模型准确预测非抛物线流型，为工业设计提供优化方案。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究倾斜壁面容器中颗粒沉降速度比垂直壁面更快的Boycott效应，探究倾斜角对不同颗粒浓度下狭窄通道内沉降行为的影响机制。

Method: 采用颗粒分辨计算流体动力学（CFD）模拟，研究不同倾斜角度和颗粒体积分数下的沉降过程，并使用一维Brinkman模型分析流型变化。

Result: 发现存在浓度依赖的最优倾斜角能最大化沉降速率；大倾斜角下通道内流型偏离经典抛物线形状；一维Brinkman模型能准确预测这些非抛物线流型。

Conclusion: 通过调整通道倾斜角可根据颗粒浓度控制和优化沉降过程，为工业和实验室过程设计提供了新的可能性框架。

Abstract: Particles are known to sediment faster in containers with tilted walls than in vertical ones, a phenomenon known as the Boycott effect. In this work, we investigate how the tilt angle influences sedimentation in narrow channels across different particle volume fractions. Using particle-resolved computational fluid dynamics simulations, we reveal that there exists a concentration-dependent optimal tilt angle that maximizes sedimentation rates. Furthermore, at large tilt angles, the flow profiles across the channel deviate from the classical parabolic shape. We show that these non-parabolic profiles can be accurately captured by a one-dimensional Brinkman model, providing a predictive framework for understanding and tuning sedimentation in tilted geometries. Our findings demonstrate the potential to control and optimize particle settling by adjusting the channel tilt according to particle concentration, opening new possibilities for design in industrial and laboratory processes.

</details>


### [307] [An Euler-Lagrangian Multiphysics Coupling Framework for Particle-Laden High-Speed Flows](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.06548)
*Hyeon Woo Nam,Tae Woong Jeong,Sung Min Jo*

Main category: physics.flu-dyn

TL;DR: 提出多求解器框架，用于耦合欧拉-拉格朗日预测，适用于各种含颗粒的高速流动条件，通过ORACLE粒子求解器与热化学非平衡流动求解器耦合，并验证了在超音速喷嘴流和火星大气进入舱气动热加热中的应用。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 高速流动中的颗粒效应需要耦合欧拉和拉格朗日预测技术，但不同热化学模型的保真度差异使得传统单一求解器开发困难，需要更灵活的计算框架。

Method: 提出多求解器框架，建立ORACLE粒子求解器（基于OpenFOAM）与热化学非平衡流动求解器之间的体积和表面耦合，采用自适应数据交换算法，并提出准一维近似与代理方法预测颗粒引起的表面侵蚀。

Result: 框架成功验证了含颗粒超音速喷嘴流和火星大气进入舱气动热加热的预测，准一维近似与代理方法能够高效准确地预测含颗粒表面侵蚀，并量化参数不确定性。

Conclusion: 开发的多求解器框架能够有效处理不同热化学模型保真度，适用于各种含颗粒高速流动条件，为高超声速气动热特性表征提供了高效准确的预测工具。

Abstract: Particle-laden effects in high-speed flows require a coupled Euler and Lagrangian prediction technique with varying fidelity of thermochemical models, depending on the simulation conditions of interest. This requirement makes the development of a conventional monolithic solver challenging to manage the different fidelity of the thermochemical models within a single computational framework. To address this, the present study proposes a multi-solver framework for the coupled Euler-Lagrangian predictions applicable to various particle-laden high-speed flow conditions. Volumetric and surface couplings are established between a particle solver ORACLE (OpenFOAM-based lagRAngian CoupLEr) and a thermochemical nonequilibrium flow solver based on an adaptable data exchange algorithm. The developed framework is then validated by predicting particle-laden supersonic nozzle flows and aerothermal heating around a hypersonic Martian atmospheric entry capsule. Finally, a quasi-1D approximation is proposed in conjunction with a surrogate method to efficiently and accurately predict particle-laden surface erosion, with quantified parametric uncertainty, for hypersonic aerothermal characterization.

</details>


### [308] [Half-explicit Runge-Kutta integrators for variational multiscale turbulence modeling: Toward higher-order accuracy in space and time](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.06626)
*Yujie Sun,Chi Ding,Ju Liu*

Main category: physics.flu-dyn

TL;DR: 将Runge-Kutta方法引入VMS框架，提出半显式RK-VMS方案，改进湍流大涡模拟的时空精度和稳定性


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统的变分多尺度方法在时间离散上主要限于二阶隐式格式，限制了计算精度和效率，需要开发更高阶的时间离散方案来改进湍流模拟性能

Method: 采用Rothe方法，在半显式Runge-Kutta框架下构建VMS方法，显式处理非线性项，推导出类似Darcy方程结构的空间问题，基于VMS分析推导亚网格尺度模型

Result: 提出的RK-VMS方案相比传统VMS方法具有更好的耗散和色散特性，在Taylor-Green涡基准测试中能更准确地预测动能演化、能谱和涡结构，在空腔流动中能准确捕捉超临界Hopf分岔引起的周期极限环

Conclusion: 成功将Runge-Kutta方法整合到VMS框架中，提高了大涡模拟的时间精度和稳定性，为对流主导的湍流模拟提供了更有效的数值方法

Abstract: The residual-based variational multiscale (VMS) formulation has achieved remarkable success in large-eddy simulation of turbulent flows. However, its temporal discretization has largely remained limited to second-order implicit schemes. The present work aims at advancing this direction through the introduction of Runge-Kutta (RK) schemes within the VMS framework in a mathematically consistent manner. Guided by the Rothe method, the half-explicit RK scheme is employed as its accuracy is theoretically guaranteed for index-2 differential-algebraic equations. Owing to the explicit treatment of the nonlinear term, the resulting spatial problem exhibits a structure analogous to that of the Darcy equation. Following the philosophy of the VMS analysis, a subgrid-scale model is derived without invoking linearization based on perturbation series and related assumptions. The analysis further reveals that the parameter in the subgrid model is independent of the spatial mesh size. Fourier analysis demonstrates that the Rothe method, compared with the conventional vertical method of lines, provides improved dissipation and dispersion properties and exhibits a larger stability region for convection-dominated regimes. In the Taylor-Green vortex benchmark, the proposed schemes demonstrate superior performance as a large-eddy simulation model, achieving higher fidelity in predicting the kinetic energy evolution, energy spectra, and vortex structures than the conventional VMS formulation. Simulations of the open cavity flow further show that the proposed schemes can accurately capture the periodic limit cycle caused by the supercritical Hopf bifurcation, confirming its effectiveness and fidelity for highly sensitive flow instability problems.

</details>


### [309] [Birth of a bubble: Drop impact onto a thin liquid film for an immiscible three-fluid system](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.06819)
*Pierre-Antoine Maës,Alidad Amirfazli,Christophe Josserand*

Main category: physics.flu-dyn

TL;DR: 研究液滴撞击不同液体薄膜时的气泡夹带机制，发现气体润滑层和薄膜黏度是影响气泡形成与演化的关键因素。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有研究主要关注液滴撞击相同液体薄膜或固体基底时的气泡夹带，但对液滴撞击不同液体薄膜的情况了解甚少，需要探索这种条件下的气泡形成机制。

Method: 采用Basilisk求解器中的流体体积法，针对三种流体（液滴、薄膜液体、气体）进行数值模拟，分析接触时间和夹带几何形状的新模型。

Result: 液体薄膜在空气缓冲作用下的变形对气泡夹带起关键作用；气体层的润滑是气泡夹带的主要机制；薄膜黏度对气泡形成和演化有重要影响，其影响程度已量化。

Conclusion: 液滴撞击不同液体薄膜时，气泡夹带机制与撞击固体基底不同，薄膜变形和黏度成为关键影响因素，为理解多流体界面相互作用提供了新见解。

Abstract: When a drop impacts a solid substrate or a thin liquid film, a thin gas disc is entrapped due to surface tension, the gas disc retracts into one or several bubbles. While the evolution of the gas disc for impact on solid substrate or film of the same fluid as the drop have been largely studied, little is known on how it varies when the liquid of the film is different that of the drop. We study numerically the latter unexplored area, focussing on the contact between the drop and the film, leading to the formation of the air bubble. The volume of fluid method was adapted to three fluids in the framework of Basilisk solver. The numerical simulations show that the deformation of the liquid film due to the air cushioning plays a crucial role in the bubble entrapment. A new model for the contact time and the entrapment geometry was deduced from the case of the impact on a solid substrate. This was done by considering the deformation of the thin immiscible liquid layer during impact depending mainly on its thickness and viscosity. The lubrication of the gas layer was found to be the major effect governing the bubble entrapment. However the film viscosity was also identified as having a critical role in bubble formation and evolution; the magnitude of its influence was also quantified.

</details>


### [310] [Inertial rotation of a small oblate spheroid in a simple shear flow](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.06822)
*Ziqi Wang,Xander M. de Wit,Davide Di Giusto,Laurence Bergougnoux,Elisabeth Guazzelli,Cristian Marchioli,Bernhard Mehlig,Federico Toschi*

Main category: physics.flu-dyn

TL;DR: 实验与模拟研究弱惯性、中性浮力、适度扁球体在受限剪切流中的取向动力学，发现限制比弱惯性对翻滚轨道稳定性影响更大


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究受限剪切流中弱惯性扁球体的取向行为，调和理论、实验和模拟结果之间的差异，特别关注限制和惯性效应的相互作用

Method: 结合实验和完全解析的粒子模拟，匹配实验条件（弱惯性、中性浮力、适度扁球体），并与小粒子雷诺数无限制理论进行基准比较

Result: 限制显著影响翻滚球体的取向稳定性，主要效应是降低向稳定翻滚轨道的漂移速率；通过考虑限制、惯性、初始条件敏感性和观测时间跨度，调和了理论、实验和模拟结果

Conclusion: 在受限剪切流中，限制效应比弱惯性对扁球体翻滚轨道稳定性的影响更为显著，这解释了先前理论、实验和模拟结果之间的不一致性

Abstract: We compare experiments and fully-resolved particle simulations designed to match the experimental conditions of a weakly inertial, neutrally buoyant, moderately oblate spheroid in shear flow under confinement. Experimental and numerical results are benchmarked against theory valid for asymptotically small particle Reynolds numbers and for unconfined systems. By considering the combined effects of confinement and inertia, sensitivity to initial conditions, and the time span of observation, we reconcile the findings of theory, experiments, and numerical simulations. Furthermore, we demonstrate that confinement significantly influences the orientational stability of log-rolling spheroids compared to weak inertia, with the primary consequence being a reduced drift rate towards the stable log-rolling orbit.

</details>


### [311] [The macroscopic contact angle of water on ice](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.06853)
*W. Sarlin,D. V. Papa,R. Grivet,A. Rosenbaum,A. Huerre,T. Séon,C. Josserand*

Main category: physics.flu-dyn

TL;DR: 实验证明水在冰上存在约12°的平衡接触角，这与热效应无关，对理解相变毛细流动有重要意义。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究水在冰上的润湿性，特别是当液体和固体由相同物质组成且处于热平衡时，理论上应完全润湿，但水在冰上却表现出部分润湿。现有研究对接触角是否对应无热效应的平衡状态仍存疑问。

Method: 在表面温度精确控制的平滑冰层上沉积水滴，观察接触线运动。通过分析惯性-毛细平衡和粘性-毛细动力学，区分热效应和毛细效应的影响。

Result: 水在冰上存在约12°的宏观接触角，该角度在低于1K的过冷度下保持恒定，且不受热效应和相变影响，是真正的平衡接触角。

Conclusion: 水在冰上存在非零的平衡接触角（约12°），这一发现对理解相变毛细流动、冰形态发生学、冰川学以及开发三相线动力学数值方法具有重要意义。

Abstract: Wettability quantifies the affinity of a liquid over a substrate, and determines whether the surface is repellent or not. When both the liquid and the solid phases are made of the same chemical substance and are at thermal equilibrium, complete wetting is expected in principle, as observed for instance with drops of molten metals spreading on their solid counterparts. However, this is not the case for water on ice. Although there is a growing consensus on the partial wetting of water on ice and several estimates available for the value of the associated contact angle, the question of whether these values correspond to the equilibrium angle without thermal effects is still open. In the present paper, we address this issue experimentally and demonstrate the existence of a macroscopic contact angle of water on ice using theoretical arguments. Indeed, when depositing water droplets on smooth ice layers with accurately controlled surface temperatures, we observe that spreading is unaffected by thermal effects and phase change close enough to the melting point. Whereas the short time \C{motion of the contact line} is driven by an inertial-capillary balance, the evolution towards equilibrium is described by a viscous-capillary dynamics and is therefore capillary - and not thermally - related. Moreover, we show that this contact angle remains constant for undercoolings below 1 K. This way, we show the existence of a non-zero equilibrium contact angle of water on ice, that it is very close to 12$^\circ$. We anticipate this key finding to significantly improve the understanding of capillary flows in the presence of phase change, which is especially useful in the context of ice morphogenesis and of glaciology, but also in the aim of developing numerical methods for resolving triple-line dynamics.

</details>


### [312] [Onset of separation unsteadiness in hypersonic shock boundary layer interaction on a cone-step](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.07089)
*Chase Jenquin,Eric L. Cui,Anubhav Dwivedi,G. S. Sidharth,Joseph S. Jewell*

Main category: physics.flu-dyn

TL;DR: 研究通过实验和模拟分析了高超声速锥体台阶流动中激波-边界层相互作用的非定常特性，揭示了从剪切层振荡到大规模脉动的不同非定常机制。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究高超声速锥体台阶流动中激波-边界层相互作用的内在非定常行为，包括剪切层振荡和大规模脉动等复杂现象，以深入理解其物理机制。

Method: 采用时间分辨纹影成像和谱本征正交分解技术，在安静流条件下对不同自由流雷诺数的马赫数6锥体台阶流动进行实验研究，并与高精度轴对称和三维模拟结果进行对比。

Result: 实验和模拟均观察到参数空间中的状态转变，从剪切层破裂到激波系统振荡，最终发展为大振幅脉动。主导模态的斯特劳哈尔数从St~0.17（小振幅振荡）降低到St~0.13（大振幅脉动）。

Conclusion: 研究详细描述了非定常激波动力学、非定常起始时剪切层的不稳定性，并分析了非线性极限环特性，为理解高超声速流动中的复杂非定常现象提供了重要见解。

Abstract: Shock-boundary layer interactions (SBLI) on hypersonic cone step flows exhibit a range of intrinsic unsteady behaviors, from shear-layer oscillations to large-scale pulsations. This work investigates the unsteadiness in a cone-step geometry at Mach 6 under quiet flow conditions at different freestream Reynolds numbers using time-resolved Schlieren imaging and spectral proper orthogonal decomposition (SPOD). Experimental results are compared with high-fidelity axisymmetric and three-dimensional simulations. Results demonstrate regime transition in the parameter space, across the unsteadiness boundary, all the way from shear-layer breakdown to shock system oscillations and ultimately to large-amplitude pulsations. The dominant mode in the experiments and the simulations corresponds to a Strouhal number St ~ 0.17 for small oscillations reducing to St ~ 0.13 for large pulsations. A detailed description of the unsteady shock dynamics, the instability of the shear layer during onset of unsteadiness and an analysis of the nonlinear limit cycle is presented.

</details>


### [313] [Surrogate-assisted airfoil optimization in rarefied gas flows](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.07093)
*Xiaoda Li,Ruifeng Yuan,Yanbing Zhang,Lei Wu*

Main category: physics.flu-dyn

TL;DR: 开发了基于贝叶斯优化的翼型设计框架，用于稀薄气体流动中的对称翼型优化，在多种稀薄条件下显著降低阻力


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 随着太空探索兴趣增长，翼型优化设计变得日益重要。然而，稀薄气体流动中的翼型设计研究不足，因为求解六维相空间的玻尔兹曼方程计算耗时

Method: 采用求解器在环的贝叶斯优化框架：1）使用形状变换参数化翼型确保几何可行性；2）将高斯过程期望提升代理模型与快速收敛的渐近保持玻尔兹曼求解器批量耦合，实现样本高效探索

Result: 在多种气体稀薄条件下识别了最小阻力翼型。优化在弱稀薄区域效果最佳（Ma=2时约30%，Ma=4时40-50%），在过渡和自由分子流区域降至几个百分点。阻力分解显示增益主要来自压力阻力降低

Conclusion: 最优翼型形成了连贯的稀薄感知家族：保持光滑单峰厚度分布，低稀薄时后加载，随稀薄度增加最大厚度和厚度区域向弦中移动。这些趋势提供了物理可解释的设计空间映射

Abstract: With growing interest in space exploration, optimized airfoil design has become increasingly important. However, airfoil design in rarefied gas flows remains underexplored because solving the Boltzmann equation formulated in a six dimensional phase space is time consuming. To address this problem, a solver-in-the-loop Bayesian optimization framework for symmetric, thickness-only airfoils is developed. First, airfoils are parameterized using a class shape transformation that enforce geometric admissibility. Second, a Gaussian process expected improvement surrogate is coupled in batches to a fast converging, asymptotic preserving Boltzmann solver for sample efficient exploration. Drag minimizing airfoils are identified in a wide range of gas rarefaction. It is found that, at Mach numbers Ma=2 and 4, the streamwise force increases with the gas rarefaction and shifts from pressure dominated to shear dominated drag, while optimization reduces drag at all conditions. The benefit of optimization peaks in the weakly rarefied regime, about 30% at Ma=2 and 40 to 50% at Ma=4, and falls to a few percent in transition and free-molecular flow regimes. Drag decomposition shows that these gains come mainly from reduced pressure drag, with viscous drag almost unchanged. The optimal airfoils form a coherent rarefaction-aware family: they retain a smooth, single-peaked thickness profile, are aft-loaded at low gas rarefaction, and exhibit a forward shift of maximum thickness and thickness area toward mid-chord as gas rarefaction increases. These trends provide a physically interpretable map that narrows the design space.

</details>


### [314] [Shock trapping and inertial escape: Dust-particle clustering in compressible turbulence](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.07164)
*Anikat Kankaria,Samriddhi Sankar Ray*

Main category: physics.flu-dyn

TL;DR: 研究惯性尘埃粒子在激波主导的可压缩湍流中的动力学和聚集行为，发现小斯托克斯数时激波捕获导致极端密度不均匀性和近乎奇异的聚集，而随着惯性增加，粒子经历惯性逃逸并在激波间穿越，产生从激波主导捕获到准弹道动力学的尖锐交叉转变。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究惯性尘埃粒子在激波主导的可压缩湍流环境（如原行星盘等天体物理环境）中的聚集行为，理解激波捕获和惯性逃逸机制如何影响尘埃浓度，这与行星形成等天体物理过程密切相关。

Method: 使用二维随机强迫Burgers方程模拟激波主导的可压缩湍流，研究不同斯托克斯数下惯性尘埃粒子的动力学行为和聚集特性，分析密度涨落、相关维数等统计量。

Result: 小斯托克斯数时激波捕获导致极端密度不均匀性和近乎奇异的聚集（相关维数趋近于零）；随着惯性增加，出现从激波主导捕获到准弹道动力学的尖锐交叉转变，伴随密度涨落显著减少和相关维数从零到嵌入维数的连续增加；中间区域呈现尺度无关的粗粒度密度统计特性。

Conclusion: 惯性尘埃粒子在激波主导的可压缩湍流中的聚集行为与不可压缩湍流中的惯性粒子聚集有本质区别，这种激波捕获-逃逸动力学对原行星盘等激波丰富的天体物理环境中的尘埃浓度有直接重要意义。

Abstract: We study the dynamics and clustering of dust particles with inertia in shock-dominated compressible turbulence using the two-dimensional, stochastically forced Burgers equation. At small Stokes numbers, shock trapping leads to extreme density inhomogeneities and nearly singular aggregation, with correlation dimensions approaching zero. With increasing inertia, particles undergo inertial escape and intermittently cross shock fronts, producing a sharp crossover from shock-dominated trapping to quasi-ballistic dynamics. This crossover is accompanied by a pronounced reduction in density fluctuations, a continuous increase of the correlation dimension from zero to the embedding dimension, and a power-law dependence of density fluctuations on the Stokes number over an extended intermediate regime. In this regime, particle distributions show scale-free coarse-grained density statistics arising from repeated trap--escape dynamics. This behaviour is qualitatively distinct from inertial-particle clustering in incompressible turbulence and is directly relevant to dust concentration in shock-rich regions of protoplanetary discs and other compressible astrophysical environments.

</details>


### [315] [Dynamics of the velocity fluctuations in sedimenting suspensions of rigid fibres](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.07258)
*Alessandro Chiarini,Emanuele Gallorini,Marco Edoardo Rosti*

Main category: physics.flu-dyn

TL;DR: 通过直接数值模拟研究刚性纤维在静止流体中重力沉降的流体-固体相互作用，发现高伽利略数和/或低浓度下纤维会形成重力对齐的流线簇，增强沉降速度和小尺度流动活动。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究悬浮液中刚性纤维在重力作用下的沉降行为，探索纤维浓度和伽利略数对流动结构、能量传递和各向异性的影响，理解纤维沉降过程中的流体-固体相互作用机制。

Method: 采用直接数值模拟方法，研究密度比约为100的刚性纤维在静止流体中的重力沉降。系统变化伽利略数(Ga)范围[180,900]和纤维浓度(nℓ_f^3)范围[0.36,23.15]，分析流动结构、能量谱、各向异性和局部速度梯度张量。

Result: 高Ga和/或低浓度下纤维形成重力对齐的流线簇，浓度和沉降速度增加，破坏流动均匀性。随着Ga增加，流体相动能上升，能谱展宽，小尺度活动增强。垂直脉动主要由流体-固体相互作用驱动，横向脉动由压力-应变效应维持。高Ga时非线性相互作用更显著，产生向小尺度的正向能量级串。低Ga时流动以轴对称压缩和二维应变为主，高Ga时高浓度区以二维应变为主，空隙区以轴对称伸展为主。

Conclusion: 纤维沉降过程中的流动特性强烈依赖于伽利略数和纤维浓度，高伽利略数促进纤维成簇、增强小尺度活动和能量级串，流动拓扑结构从低伽利略数的轴对称压缩向高伽利略数的二维应变和轴对称伸展转变，流体运动以伸展为主而非旋转。

Abstract: We use direct numerical simulations to investigate fluid-solid interactions in suspensions of rigid fibres settling under gravity in a quiescent fluid. The solid-to-fluid density ratio is $\mathcal{O}(100)$, while the Galileo number ($Ga$) and fibre concentration ($n\ell_f^3$) are varied over the ranges $Ga \in [180, 900]$ and $n\ell_f^3 \in [0.36, 23.15]$; $\ell_f$ denotes the fibre length and $n$ the number density. At high $Ga$ and/or low $n\ell_f^3$, fibres cluster into gravity-aligned streamers with elevated concentrations and enhanced settling velocities, disrupting the flow homogeneity. As $Ga$ increases and/or $n\ell_f^3$ decreases, the fluid-phase kinetic energy rises and the energy spectrum broadens, reflecting enhanced small-scale activity. The flow anisotropy is assessed by decomposing the energy spectrum into components aligned with and transverse to gravity. Vertical fluctuations are primarily driven by fluid-solid interactions, while transverse ones are maintained by pressure-strain effects that promote isotropy. With increasing $Ga$, nonlinear interactions become more prominent, producing a net forward energy cascade toward smaller scales, punctuated by localised backscatter events. Analysis of the local velocity gradient tensor reveals distinct flow topologies: at low $Ga$, the flow is dominated by axisymmetric compression and two-dimensional straining; at high $Ga$, regions of high fibre concentration are governed by two-dimensional strain, while voids are associated with axisymmetric extension. The fluid motion is predominantly extensional rather than rotational.

</details>


### [316] [Preliminary Study of the Effects of Leading-Edge Serration on a Two-Section Planar Wing in ground-effect at Low Reynolds Number](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.07270)
*Arnold Lafond-Saunierr,Simone Basile,Paloma Pizarro,Kiana Yamamoto,Hassan M. Nagib,Ricardo Vinuesa,Raffaello Mariani*

Main category: physics.flu-dyn

TL;DR: 锯齿前缘能提高梯形翼的最大升力系数和失速迎角，但在地面效应中的表现尚不明确


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究锯齿前缘对梯形翼气动性能的影响，特别是在地面效应和非地面效应条件下的表现差异

Method: 采用数值模拟和实验验证相结合的方法，分析锯齿前缘和直前缘两种几何形状在有无地面效应条件下的气动性能

Result: 锯齿前缘通过形成一系列反向旋转的涡对重新激发流动，提高了最大升力系数和失速迎角；地面效应中两种前缘都提高了效率，但锯齿前缘在高迎角下的数值结果出现显著下降

Conclusion: 锯齿前缘能有效改善翼型气动性能，但地面效应下的高迎角性能需要更高精度的数值模型进一步研究

Abstract: A preliminary study has been conducted on the effects of serration on the leading-edge of a two-element trapezoidal wing placed both out-of- and in-ground effect. Aerodynamic performance and flow behaviour were evaluated numerically and validated experimentally. Results indicate an increase in maximum lift coefficient and stall angle obtained implementing a serrated leading-edge geometry due to the flow being re-energized by the formation of a series of counter-rotating pairs of vortices.
  Results from the analysis of the wing in ground effect appear less well defined. Both leading-edge geometries -- straight and serrated -- show an increase in efficiency due to the proximity to the ground. The wing with the straight leading-edge geometry shows constant improvement up to stall, whilst numerical results show a significant decrease in lift performance at high angles of attack. This may be caused by the lower-fidelity numerical model implemented at higher angles of attack, thus yielding less accurate results.

</details>


### [317] [Memory effects in wave-induced microplastic transport](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.07402)
*Mary Eby,Cathal Cummins*

Main category: physics.flu-dyn

TL;DR: 该研究通过实现历史项的多步积分方案，扩展了微塑料在海洋表面波中传输模型的适用范围，揭示了Basset-Boussinesq历史力对较大微塑料传输的重要影响。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有微塑料传输模型通常忽略Basset-Boussinesq历史力，限制了其仅适用于最小粒径的颗粒。需要扩展模型以准确模拟较大微塑料在表面波中的传输。

Method: 采用多步积分方案实现历史项，建立能够捕捉任意深度线性表面波中较大微塑料传输的模型。通过无量纲参数S=St/γ²量化历史力的影响。

Result: 当S超过临界值约0.25时，记忆效应成为主导水平拖曳力。相应的临界St数比忽略历史效应的经典惯性估计小约三倍。历史效应显著增加水平传输距离并增强粒子集合的轨道剪切。

Conclusion: 该研究提供了可用于指示何时可以安全忽略历史效应的区域图，扩展了微塑料传输模型的适用范围，为更准确地模拟海洋中微塑料的传输提供了理论基础。

Abstract: Microplastics are transported by ocean surface waves in ways that depart significantly from the Stokes drift of fluid parcels, and accurate modeling of this transport requires accounting for forces beyond linear drag. Existing modeling of microplastic transport often neglect the Basset-Boussinesq history force, effectively limiting their use to the smallest particle sizes. Here, we extend the applicability of these models by implementing the history term with a multistep integration scheme, allowing us to capture the transport of larger microplastics in linear surface waves of arbitrary depth. We quantify when the Basset-Boussinesq history force significantly affects microplastic transport by surface gravity waves. We show that memory effects become the leading-order horizontal drag once $S=St/γ^2$ exceeds a critical value $S\approx 0.25$, where $St$ is the Stokes number and $γ$ is the density ratio of the particle and the fluid. The corresponding critical $St$ number is found to be a factor of about three smaller than that given by classical inertial estimates that neglect history effects. These results help provide regime maps that can be used to indicate when history effects can be safely neglected. Our simulations also reveal that history effects significantly increase horizontal transport distances and enhance orbit shearing of particle ensembles.

</details>


### [318] [Tensor Network Fluid Simulations in Structured Domains Using the Lattice Boltzmann Method](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.07615)
*Lukas Gross,David M. Wawrzyniak,Josef M. Winter,Nikolaus A. Adams,Elie Mounzer*

Main category: physics.flu-dyn

TL;DR: 提出基于矩阵乘积态的张量网络格点玻尔兹曼方法，实现复杂几何中流体场的高效压缩表示，压缩比超100倍，为连续介质力学提供可扩展计算范式。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 高保真流体模拟对理解输运现象至关重要，但现有方法在模拟大型或几何复杂系统时计算成本过高，需要新的高效计算方法。

Method: 基于矩阵乘积态的张量网络格点玻尔兹曼方法，利用量子启发式方法对结构化流场进行压缩表示，具有内在误差控制机制。

Result: 在结构化介质和复杂血管几何中的流动模拟表明，当几何具有平移或近似对称性时，流体状态在MPS形式下表现出低有效复杂度，压缩比超过两个数量级，同时保持物理结构和动力学保真度。

Conclusion: 张量网络技术首次被证明能高效求解复杂不规则域中的流体动力学问题，为连续介质力学提供了可扩展的计算范式，使先前难以处理的数值探索成为可能。

Abstract: High-fidelity fluid simulations are central to understanding transport phenomena, yet resolving large or geometrically complex systems remains computationally prohibitive with existing methods. Here we introduce a tensor-network formulation of the lattice Boltzmann method based on matrix product states (MPS), commonly known as a quantum-inspired approach, enabling compressed representations of structured flow fields with inherent error control. We demonstrate the generality of the method on flows through structured media and complex vascular geometries, establishing for the first time that tensor-network techniques can efficiently resolve fluid dynamics in complex, irregular domains. We show that in the presence of translational or approximate symmetries of the geometry, fluid states exhibit low effective complexity in MPS form, yielding compression ratios exceeding two orders of magnitude while preserving physical structure and dynamical fidelity. This reduction enables systematic numerical exploration of regimes that were previously intractable. Our results position tensor networks as a scalable paradigm for continuum mechanics.

</details>


### [319] [Fold catastrophe in breaking waves](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.07644)
*Francesco Fedele*

Main category: physics.flu-dyn

TL;DR: 该论文从动力系统角度研究理想不可压缩自由表面流中的波浪破碎现象，揭示了波浪破碎的几何骨架结构和临界角度阈值。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究波浪破碎的动力学机制，从动力系统角度理解波浪破碎的临界条件和几何结构，为预测和解释波浪破碎现象提供理论框架。

Method: 通过追踪波浪表面最活跃的热点区域，分析表面斜率m和聚焦参数A的演化，建立慢-快时间尺度结构，揭示折叠突变在波浪破碎中的几何骨架作用。

Result: 发现波浪破碎由(m,A)空间中的折叠突变边界决定，临界角度θ*=22.5度标志着破碎开始，速度Hessian的各向异性导致陡波拐点处出现经典的30度斜率。

Conclusion: 波浪破碎可视为重力场中的黑洞坍缩类比，具有明显的几何骨架结构和临界阈值，为理解波浪破碎的动力学机制提供了新的理论视角。

Abstract: We present a dynamical-systems perspective on wave breaking for ideal incompressible free-surface flows. By tracking the most energetic hotspot on the wave surface, we find that near breaking the surface slope m evolves on a fast timescale governed by the small parameter epsilon = (partial_z u)^(-1), the inverse vertical velocity gradient at the hotspot, while the focusing parameter A = (U - Ce)/(U - Creq) varies slowly and adiabatically. Here U is the horizontal fluid velocity at the energetic point, Ce its propagation speed, and Creq the equivalent crest speed. This slow-fast structure reveals a fold catastrophe in the (m, A) space whose boundary forms the geometric skeleton organizing the dynamics near breaking. Finite-time blowup occurs when the trajectory crosses this boundary, marking the onset of breaking.
  The inception of breaking is further characterized by crossing the slope threshold theta* = arctan(sqrt(2) - 1) = 22.5 degrees. This critical angle marks the maximum anisotropy that can be sustained between the Hessians of the velocity and pressure fields, reflecting an imbalance between kinetic and potential energy fluxes. The anisotropy of the velocity Hessian also gives rise to the classical 30-degree slope observed at the inflection point of steep waves near breaking inception. The crest height is limited by the maximum excess of kinetic over potential energy that the flow can sustain, beyond which breaking becomes inevitable. Wave breaking can also be interpreted as a gravity analogue of a collapsing black hole, with apparent and event horizons representing the onset and inception of breaking.

</details>


### [320] [Integral constraints on the linear instability of stratified flow with planar shear at an arbitrary angle to the vertical](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.07817)
*Miguel A. C. Teixeira,Mohamed Foudad,Paul D. Williams*

Main category: physics.flu-dyn

TL;DR: 推导了分层平行流在任意角度平面剪切下的线性不稳定性积分约束，扩展了Miles-Howard定理，但未发现非垂直剪切下的稳定性条件


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究分层平行流在任意角度平面剪切下的线性不稳定性，扩展经典的Miles-Howard稳定性理论到更一般的剪切方向

Method: 采用Miles和Howard的分析方法，推导具有二维空间结构的扰动（被认为是最不稳定）的积分约束条件

Result: 1. 重现了垂直剪切的Miles-Howard稳定性判据；2. 未发现非垂直剪切的稳定性条件；3. 将Howard半圆定理扩展到非垂直平面剪切；4. 推导了不稳定性增长率上界的新表达式

Conclusion: 该研究扩展了经典稳定性理论到更一般的剪切方向，为分层剪切流的稳定性分析提供了新的理论工具和约束条件

Abstract: Integral constraints on the linear instability of stratified parallel flow with planar shear at an arbitrary angle to the vertical are derived using the analytical approach of Miles and Howard, for perturbations with 2D spatial structure, which are thought to be the most unstable. The general stability formulation reproduces the Miles-Howard stability criterion for vertical shear, but yields no stability condition for non-vertical shear, confirming expectations from earlier studies. This study also extends Howard's semicircle theorem to non-vertical planar shear, and derives a new expression for the upper bound of the instability growth rate (extending that obtained by Howard), which is consistent with published numerical results.

</details>

### [321] [Proof of Concept for Mammography Classification with Enhanced Compactness and Separability Modules](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.06575)
*Fariza Dahes*

Main category: eess.IV

TL;DR: 验证并扩展了用于医学图像分类的方法框架，将改进的ConvNeXt Tiny架构应用于乳腺X光分类，评估了GAGM和SEVector模块的有效性，但发现特征平滑损失在乳腺X光分类中无效。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 验证先前在阿尔茨海默症MRI分类中表现良好的方法框架（包含GAGM、SEVector和FSL）是否可转移到乳腺X光分类任务中，并扩展该框架以提供更全面的评估和临床工具。

Method: 使用整合INbreast、MIAS和DDSM的Kaggle数据集，比较基线CNN、ConvNeXt Tiny和InceptionV3骨干网络，并加入GAGM和SEVector模块。进行多指标评估（宏观F1、每类召回方差、ROC/AUC）、特征可解释性分析（Grad-CAM）并开发交互式临床仪表板。

Result: GAGM和SEVector模块有效增强了特征区分能力并减少了假阴性（特别是恶性病例），但特征平滑损失在乳腺X光分类条件下未产生可测量的改进。扩展了原始框架的多指标评估和可解释性分析。

Conclusion: 成功验证了GAGM和SEVector模块在乳腺X光分类中的有效性，但特征平滑损失的效果依赖于特定架构和计算假设。未来需要探索改进类内紧凑性和类间分离性的方法，以增强乳腺X光中恶性和良性病例的区分。

Abstract: This study presents a validation and extension of a recent methodological framework for medical image classification. While an improved ConvNeXt Tiny architecture, integrating Global Average and Max Pooling fusion (GAGM), lightweight channel attention (SEVector), and Feature Smoothing Loss (FSL), demonstrated promising results on Alzheimer MRI under CPU friendly conditions, our work investigates its transposability to mammography classification. Using a Kaggle dataset that consolidates INbreast, MIAS, and DDSM mammography collections, we compare a baseline CNN, ConvNeXt Tiny, and InceptionV3 backbones enriched with GAGM and SEVector modules. Results confirm the effectiveness of GAGM and SEVector in enhancing feature discriminability and reducing false negatives, particularly for malignant cases. In our experiments, however, the Feature Smoothing Loss did not yield measurable improvements under mammography classification conditions, suggesting that its effectiveness may depend on specific architectural and computational assumptions. Beyond validation, our contribution extends the original framework through multi metric evaluation (macro F1, per class recall variance, ROC/AUC), feature interpretability analysis (Grad CAM), and the development of an interactive dashboard for clinical exploration. As a perspective, we highlight the need to explore alternative approaches to improve intra class compactness and inter class separability, with the specific goal of enhancing the distinction between malignant and benign cases in mammography classification.

</details>


<div id='math.NA'></div>

# math.NA [[Back]](#toc)

### [322] [RationalFunctionApproximation.jl: Rational Approximation On Discrete and Continuous Domains](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.06140)
*Tobin A. Driscoll*

Main category: math.NA

TL;DR: RationalFunctionApproximation 包提供 AAA 和贪婪 Thiele 算法的最快实现，支持任意精度，结合 ComplexRegions 包可在复平面上各种区域高效逼近函数。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 有理函数相比多项式能更好地表示具有极点或分支割线的函数，具有根指数收敛性且无龙格现象。AAA 和贪婪 Thiele 算法的发展重新激发了计算有理逼近的兴趣。

Method: RationalFunctionApproximation 包实现了 AAA 和贪婪 Thiele 算法，提供最快的已知实现和唯一的任意精度版本。结合 ComplexRegions 包，可在区间、圆形或其他复平面区域上生成紧凑准确的有理函数表示。

Result: 该包能够为各种函数在复平面上的不同区域（区间、圆形等）生成紧凑且准确的表示，支持任意精度计算。

Conclusion: RationalFunctionApproximation 包提供了当前最先进的有理逼近工具，结合 ComplexRegions 包能够高效处理复杂的函数逼近问题，特别适合处理具有奇点的函数。

Abstract: Unlike polynomials, rational functions can represent functions having poles or branch cuts with root-exponential convergence and no Runge phenomenon. Recent developments of the AAA and greedy Thiele algorithms have sparked renewed interest in computational rational approximation. The \textsf{RationalFunctionApproximation} package supplies the fastest known implementations of these methods and the only arbitrary-precision ones. Combined with the \textsf{ComplexRegions} package, it can produce compact and accurate representations of a huge variety of functions over intervals, circles, or other domains in the complex plane.

</details>


### [323] [A polynomial dimension-dependence analysis of Bramble--Pasciak--Xu preconditioners](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.06166)
*Boou Jiang,Jongho Park,Jinchao Xu*

Main category: math.NA

TL;DR: BPX预处理器的条件数随空间维度仅多项式增长，为高维PDE求解提供高效预处理方法，对量子计算有重要应用价值。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究高维偏微分方程求解中BPX预处理器的维度依赖性，特别是条件数随空间维度的增长行为。这对于量子计算算法特别重要，因为BPX预处理器的多项式维度依赖性可以为量子算法带来指数级加速。

Method: 1. 仔细推导有限元方法中基本工具的维度依赖性：椭圆正则性、Bramble-Hilbert引理、迹不等式和逆不等式；2. 引入新的拟插值算子（经典Scott-Zhang插值的变体），其相关常数随维度多项式增长；3. 建立多层范数等价定理；4. 推导具有明确多项式维度依赖界的BPX预处理器。

Result: 证明了BPX预处理系统的条件数仅随空间维度多项式增长，而不是指数增长。建立了具有明确多项式维度依赖界的BPX预处理器，为高维PDE求解提供了高效预处理方法。

Conclusion: BPX预处理器在高维PDE求解中具有多项式维度依赖性，这一结果对量子计算有重要意义：BPX预处理器的多项式维度依赖性可以为量子算法方法带来相对于经典方法的指数级加速。

Abstract: We investigate the dimension dependence of Bramble--Pasciak--Xu (BPX) preconditioners for high-dimensional partial differential equations and establish that the condition numbers of BPX-preconditioned systems grow only polynomially with the spatial dimension. Our analysis requires a careful derivation of the dimension dependence of several fundamental tools in the theory of finite element methods, including the elliptic regularity, Bramble--Hilbert lemma, trace inequalities, and inverse inequalities. We further introduce a new quasi-interpolation operator into finite element spaces, a variant of the classical Scott--Zhang interpolation, whose associated constants scale polynomially with the dimension. Building on these ingredients, we prove a multilevel norm equivalence theorem and derive a BPX preconditioner with explicit polynomial bounds on its dimensional dependence. This result has notable implications for emerging quantum computing methodologies: recent studies indicate that polynomial dependence of BPX preconditioners on dimension can yield exponential speedups for quantum-algorithmic approaches over their classical counterparts.

</details>


### [324] [Quadratic Formula-based Nonlinear Approximation](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.06246)
*Ziqin He,Can Chen,Min Hyung Cho,Jingfang Huang,Yichao Wu*

Main category: math.NA

TL;DR: 本文提出了一种基于二次公式的非线性表示方法，用于逼近单变量函数f(x)。通过构造系数函数a(x)、b(x)、c(x)，将函数重构问题转化为求解二次方程a(x)f²-b(x)f-c(x)=0，该方法在具有尖锐过渡或不连续的函数上优于传统正交多项式和有理逼近。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统的最小二乘逼近（基于正交多项式）和有理逼近在处理具有尖锐过渡或不连续的函数时效果有限。需要一种新的非线性表示方法，能够更好地捕捉这类函数的特性，同时保持计算上的可行性。

Method: 1. 使用最小二乘法构造显式的多项式系数函数a(x)、b(x)、c(x)
2. 通过求解二次方程a(x)f²-b(x)f-c(x)=0重构函数f
3. 使用索引函数选择二次公式中的正确符号
4. 将该表示应用于数据去噪，利用系数函数的平滑性在低维流形上进行最小二乘去噪

Result: 1. 二次公式非线性逼近（f的2次）在具有尖锐过渡或不连续的函数上优于传统正交多项式最小二乘逼近（f的0次）和有理逼近（f的1次）
2. 该方法可有效应用于数据去噪，通过去噪索引函数实现分类/聚类
3. 数值结果和去噪示例验证了该方法的有效性

Conclusion: 基于二次公式的非线性表示为函数逼近提供了一种新方法，特别适用于具有尖锐特性的函数。该方法在去噪应用中表现出潜力，同时提出了数值稳定性、最优算法构建和索引函数经济表示等理论和数值问题需要进一步研究。

Abstract: This paper presents a quadratic formula-based nonlinear representation for a given single-variable function f(x), $-1 \leq x \leq 1$. First, we construct the explicit polynomial coefficient functions a(x), b(x), and c(x) using a least-squares approach. Then, f is reconstructed by solving the degree-2 polynomial equation a(x) f^2 - b(x) f - c(x)=0 for any $x \in [-1,1]$, where an index function is used to select the correct sign in the quadratic formula. The quadratic formula-based nonlinear approximation (degree-2 in f) outperforms classical orthogonal polynomial-based least-squares approximation (degree-0 in f) and rational approximation (degree-1 in f) for functions with sharp transitions or discontinuities. As a potential application, we apply the degree-2 representation to data denoising. Instead of relying on more complex "edge-preserving" metric-based optimization techniques, the smooth coefficient functions a(x), b(x), and c(x) enable effective least-squares-based denoising on the low-dimensional manifold described by the algebraic variety a(x) f^2 - b(x) f - c(x)=0. Denoising the index function, which determines the appropriate root to select, can be achieved using classical statistical or modern classification/clustering techniques. Numerical results and data denoising examples are provided to demonstrate the effectiveness of the degree-2 nonlinear approximation technique. The new nonlinear, quadratic formula-based representation also raises theoretical and numerical questions, including strategies for identifying numerically stable representations, developing optimal algorithms to construct the polynomial coefficient functions a(x), b(x), and c(x), and achieving economical representation and denoising of the index function.

</details>


### [325] [A two-stage explicit/implicit approach combined with mixed finite element methods for a radiation-conduction model in optically thick anisotropic media](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.06456)
*Eric Ngondiep*

Main category: math.NA

TL;DR: 本文提出了一种结合混合有限元法的两阶段显式/隐式计算技术，用于求解各向异性介质中的非线性辐射-传导问题，该算法具有空间四阶收敛和时间二阶精度。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 需要开发一种高效稳定的数值方法来求解各向异性介质中的非线性辐射-传导问题，该问题具有复杂的物理特性和计算挑战。

Method: 采用混合有限元法（Pp/Pp-1/Pp-1）近似空间导数，使用两阶段显式/隐式插值技术近似时间导数，形成预测-校正数值格式。

Result: 理论分析表明该方法在时间步长限制下稳定，具有空间四阶收敛和时间二阶精度，数值实验验证了理论结果并展示了算法的实际适用性。

Conclusion: 提出的两阶段显式/隐式计算技术结合混合有限元法是一种有效求解非线性辐射-传导问题的高精度稳定数值方法。

Abstract: This paper develops a two-stage explicit/impicit computational technique combined with a mixed finite element method for solving a nonlinear radiation-conduction problem in anisotropic media, subject to suitable initial and boundary conditions. The space derivatives are approximated by the mixed finite element method ($\mathcal{P}_{p}/\mathcal{P}_{p-1}/\mathcal{P}_{p-1}$), while the interpolation technique is employed in two stages to approximate the time derivative. The proposed strategy is so-called, a two-stage explicit/implicit computational technique combined with mixed finite element method. Specifically, the new algorithm should be observed as a predictor-corrector numerical scheme. Additionally, it efficiently treats the time derivative term and provides a necessary requirement on time step for stability. Under this time step limitation, the stability is deeply analyzed whereas the convergence order is numerically obtained in the $L^{2}$-norm. The theoretical results suggest that the developed approach is spatial fourth-order convergent and temporal second-order accurate. Some numerical experiments are carried out to confirm the theoretical results and to demonstrate the practical applicability of the new algorithm.

</details>


### [326] [B-spline periodization of Fourier pseudo-spectral method for non-periodic problems](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.06631)
*Dongan Li,Mou Lin,Shunxiang Cao,Shengli Chen*

Main category: math.NA

TL;DR: 提出B样条周期化傅里叶方法，用于非周期问题的谱精度求解，结合B样条边界匹配和傅里叶残差修正，在保持谱精度的同时处理边界问题。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统谱方法存在局限性：傅里叶伪谱方法仅适用于周期域，在非周期问题中会出现吉布斯振荡；切比雪夫方法需要边界聚集网格，不符合许多物理问题的特性。需要一种既能处理非周期问题，又能保持谱精度和效率的方法。

Method: 提出B样条周期化傅里叶方法：结合B样条近似和基于傅里叶的残差修正。B样条分量强制边界值和导数的平滑匹配，周期性残差通过傅里叶微分/积分高效处理。该方法在域内保持谱收敛，在边界处保持代数收敛。通过解析映射扩展到非均匀网格，可在急剧变化区域选择性细化网格。

Result: 数值测试表明，BSPF方法在微分和积分方面的精度优于切比雪夫和有限差分方案，特别适用于内部振荡数据。应用于一维Burgers方程和二维浅水方程时，能够准确解析急剧梯度和非线性波传播。

Conclusion: BSPF方法为求解非周期偏微分方程提供了一个灵活高效的高阶精度框架，克服了传统谱方法的限制，在保持谱精度的同时有效处理非周期边界问题。

Abstract: Spectral methods are renowned for their high accuracy and efficiency in solving partial differential equations. The Fourier pseudo-spectral method is limited to periodic domains and suffers from Gibbs oscillations in non-periodic problems. The Chebyshev method mitigates this issue but requires edge-clustered grids, which does not match the characteristics of many physical problems. To overcome these restrictions, we propose a B-spline-periodized Fourier (BSPF) method that extends to non-periodic problems while retaining spectral-like accuracy and efficiency. The method combines a B-spline approximation with a Fourier-based residual correction. The B-spline component enforces the smooth matching of boundary values and derivatives, while the periodic residual is efficiently treated by Fourier differentiation/integration. This construction preserves spectral convergence within the domain and algebraic convergence at the boundaries. Numerical tests on differentiation and integration confirm the accuracy of the BSPF method superior to Chebyshev and finite-difference schemes for interior-oscillatory data. Analytical mapping further extends BSPF to non-uniform meshes, which enables selective grid refinement in regions of sharp variation. Applications of the BSPF method to the one-dimensional Burgers' equation and two-dimensional shallow water equations demonstrate accurate resolution of sharp gradients and nonlinear wave propagation, proving it as a flexible and efficient framework for solving non-periodic PDEs with high-order accuracy.

</details>


### [327] [FEALPy v3: A Cross-platform Intelligent Numerical Simulation Engine](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.06632)
*Yangyang Zheng,Huayi Wei,Yunqing Huang,Chunyu Chen,Tian Tian,Hanbin Liu,Wenbin Wang,Liang He*

Main category: math.NA

TL;DR: FEALPy是一个基于统一张量抽象层的模块化数值模拟引擎，支持多种计算后端（NumPy、PyTorch、JAX），旨在解决数值模拟软件生态碎片化问题，实现不同数值方法与深度学习工作流的无缝集成。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 当前数值模拟软件生态高度碎片化，不同算法和离散方法通常孤立实现，具有不同的数据结构和编程规范。这种碎片化加上不同研究领域软件包之间的鸿沟以及缺乏统一通用数据结构，阻碍了集成化、跨平台解决方案的发展。

Method: FEALPy采用模块化设计，围绕统一张量抽象层构建，支持多种计算后端（NumPy、PyTorch、JAX），确保在CPU和GPU硬件系统上的一致适应性。其模块化架构支持从网格处理、组装到求解器执行的完整模拟流程，并内置自动微分支持。

Result: 该框架通过线性弹性、高阶PDE、移动网格方法、反问题和路径规划等多个应用展示了其多功能性和有效性，证明了其在不同数值模拟场景中的实用价值。

Conclusion: FEALPy提供了一个统一的数值模拟平台，通过统一的张量抽象层和模块化设计，成功解决了数值模拟生态的碎片化问题，实现了不同数值方法与深度学习工作流的无缝集成，为跨平台、集成化的数值模拟解决方案提供了有效工具。

Abstract: In resent years, the software ecosystem for numerical simulation still remains fragmented, with different algorithms and discretization methods often implemented in isolation, each with distinct data structures and programming conventions. This fragmentation is compounded by the growing divide between packages from different research fields and the lack of a unified, universal data structure, hindering the development of integrated, cross-platform solutions. In this work, we introduce FEALPy, a numerical simulation engine built around a unified tensor abstraction layer in a modular design. It enables seamless integration between diverse numerical methods along with deep learning workflows. By supporting multiple computational backends such as NumPy, PyTorch, and JAX, FEALPy ensures consistent adaptability across CPU and GPU hardware systems. Its modular architecture facilitates the entire simulation pipeline, from mesh handling and assembly to solver execution, with built-in support for automatic differentiation. In this paper, the versatility and efficacy of the framework are demonstrated through applications spanning linear elasticity, high-order PDEs, moving mesh methods, inverse problems and path planning.

</details>


### [328] [Coarse spaces for virtual element methods on irregular 3D subdomain decompositions](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.07181)
*Ana Aguilar-Pineda,Luis F. Amey,Adrian Angulo-Paniagua,Juan G. Calvo*

Main category: math.NA

TL;DR: 提出了一种用于三维虚拟元方法离散问题的两层重叠Schwarz预处理器，能够处理一般多面体网格和不规则子域，数值实验显示其性能鲁棒且条件数界限与传统有限元结果相当。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 扩展重叠Schwarz方法在三维虚拟元方法中的应用，处理传统方法难以应对的一般多面体网格和不规则子域问题，提供更通用的求解器方案。

Method: 采用两层重叠Schwarz预处理器设计，第一层为局部子域求解器，第二层为粗网格校正，专门针对三维虚拟元离散问题优化，支持不规则子域划分。

Result: 数值实验表明该方法对子域数量和网格参数具有鲁棒性，条件数界限与传统有限元方法结果相当，虽然存在FETI-DP和BDDC等替代方法，但本方法的简单性和竞争力突出。

Conclusion: 提出的重叠Schwarz预处理器成功扩展了三维虚拟元方法的求解能力，在处理复杂几何和网格方面具有实际应用价值，为虚拟元方法提供了有效的并行求解方案。

Abstract: We present a two-level overlapping Schwarz preconditioner for three-dimensional problems discretized with the Virtual Element Method. Our approach handles general polyhedral meshes and irregular subdomains, extending the applicability of previous methods. Numerical experiments show robust performance with respect to the number of subdomains and mesh parameters, with condition-number bound comparable to classical finite element results. While alternative methods such as FETI-DP and BDDC are available, the simplicity and competitiveness of overlapping additive Schwarz methods underscore the practical significance of our contribution.

</details>


### [329] [Escaping the native space of Sobolev kernels by interpolation](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.07262)
*Tobias Ehring,Max-Paul Vogel,Bernard Haasdonk*

Main category: math.NA

TL;DR: 该论文提出了一个分析核插值在原生空间之外收敛性的通用框架，通过插值算子的有界性来刻画收敛条件，并应用于Sobolev核证明了连续函数在L²范数下的收敛性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统核插值收敛分析要求目标函数位于核诱导的再生核希尔伯特空间(RKHS)中，这在实际应用中过于严格。需要建立更一般的框架来分析核插值在原生空间之外的收敛性。

Method: 建立Banach空间嵌入框架：$\mathcal{H}_k(Ω) \hookrightarrow A(Ω)\hookrightarrow B(Ω)$，其中点值泛函在A(Ω)上连续，RKHS在A(Ω)中稠密。通过插值算子$Π^{\,n}_{A,B}:A(Ω)\to B(Ω)$的一致有界性来刻画核插值在B(Ω)范数下的收敛性。

Result: 1. 对于Sobolev核(τ>N/2)在Lipschitz域上，证明所有连续函数f∈C(Ω̅)都可以通过拟一致节点在L²(Ω)范数下被插值逼近。2. 对于特定Sobolev核(包括整数阶Matérn核)，在区间[a,b]上拟一致节点下Lebesgue常数一致有界，这意味着插值在sup范数下对所有连续函数f∈C([a,b])收敛。

Conclusion: 该研究建立了核插值超越原生空间的收敛性分析框架，为核方法在更广泛函数类中的应用提供了理论基础，特别证明了Sobolev核插值对连续函数的收敛性，扩展了核插值的适用范围。

Abstract: Classical convergence analysis for kernel interpolation typically assumes that the target function $f$ lies in the reproducing kernel Hilbert space $\mathcal{H}_k\!\left(Ω\right)$ induced by a kernel on a domain $Ω\subset\mathbb{R}^N$. For many applications, however, this assumption is overly restrictive. We develop a general framework for analyzing the convergence of kernel interpolation {beyond the native space}. Let $A(Ω)$ and $B(Ω)$ be Banach spaces with continuous embeddings $\mathcal{H}_k\!\left(Ω\right) \hookrightarrow A(Ω)\hookrightarrow B(Ω)$, assume point evaluation is continuous on $A(Ω)$, and that $\mathcal{H}_k\!\left(Ω\right)$ is dense in $A(Ω)$. For a nested sequence of node sets $(X_n)_{n\ge1}\subsetΩ$ with $\bigcup_n X_n$ dense, we characterize convergence of the kernel interpolants in the $B(Ω)$-norm for all target functions in $A(Ω)$ via the uniform boundedness of the interpolation operators $Π^{\,n}_{A,B}:A(Ω)\to B(Ω)$. This yields a necessary and sufficient condition under which kernel interpolation extends beyond $\mathcal{H}_k\!\left(Ω\right)$. Specializing to Sobolev kernels of order $τ>N/2$ on bounded Lipschitz domains, we show that every $f \in C(\overlineΩ)$ can be approximated in the $L^2(Ω)$-norm by interpolation using quasi-uniform nested centers. Moreover, for a subclass of Sobolev kernels (including integer-order Matérn kernels), we prove that the Lebesgue constant is uniformly bounded on $[a,b]\subset\mathbb{R}$ under quasi-uniform centers; within our framework this implies supremum norm convergence of the interpolants for every target functions $f \in C([a,b])$.

</details>


### [330] [On the Orbits of Similarity Classes of Tetrahedra Generated by the Longest-Edge Bisection Algorithm](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.07315)
*Jérôme Michaud,Sergey Korotov*

Main category: math.NA

TL;DR: 研究四面体最长边二分法（LEB）算法生成的相似类动力学，通过规范化表示和离散动力系统分析，发现算法不会产生退化四面体，为有限元方法提供理论支持。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究四面体最长边二分法（LEB）算法的形状演化动力学，验证算法是否会产生退化四面体，这对于有限元方法等应用至关重要。

Method: 构建四面体的规范化表示空间（嵌入双曲半平面和半空间模型的乘积空间），定义左右细化映射Φ_L和Φ_R，将LEB算法转化为离散动力系统进行分析。

Result: 发现Sommerville四面体的轨道仅包含4个相似类，其中3个形成吸引环；正则四面体的小扰动轨道也是有限的；数值探索表明LEB算法不会产生退化四面体。

Conclusion: 该框架为分析四面体网格的形状演化提供了几何和动力学基础，并为证明LEB细化生成的四面体划分的非退化性提供了可能途径，这对有限元方法等应用具有重要意义。

Abstract: In this work, we study the dynamics of similarity classes of tetrahedra generated by the longest-edge bisection (LEB) algorithm. Building on the normalization strategy introduced by Perdomo and Plaza for triangles, we construct a canonical representation of tetrahedra in a normalized space embedded in the product of the hyperbolic half-plane and the hyperbolic half-space model. This representation allows us to define the left and right refinement maps, $Φ_L$ and $Φ_R$, acting on the space of normalized tetrahedral shapes, and to study their iterative orbits as discrete dynamical systems. Using these maps, we show that the orbit of the space-filling Sommerville tetrahedron contains only 4 similarity classes, 3 of which form an attractive cycle corresponding to the orbit of the path tetrahedron. We also show that small perturbations of elements in those orbits still lead to finite orbits. In addition, we study small perturbations of the regular tetrahedron and show that their orbits are also finite. Extensive numerical exploration of orbits for the other types of tetrahedra suggests that the LEB algorithm does not produce degenerating tetrahedra. Our framework provides a geometric and dynamical foundation for analyzing the shape evolution of tetrahedral meshes and offers a possible route toward an analytic proof of the non-degeneracy property for the tetrahedral partitions generated by the LEB refinements. This property is highly desired in e.g. the finite element methods (FEMs).

</details>


### [331] [On semi-separability and differentiation matrices](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.07365)
*Arieh Iserles*

Main category: math.NA

TL;DR: 研究雅可比多项式正交基的微分矩阵结构，证明其为秩2的半可分矩阵


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 谱方法中微分矩阵的结构特性对方法设计至关重要。已知拉盖尔和超球多项式基产生秩1的半可分微分矩阵，但雅可比多项式基的微分矩阵结构尚未明确

Method: 使用雅可比多项式构造正交基，通过理论分析证明对应的微分矩阵具有秩2的半可分结构，并发展了相关的半可分矩阵理论

Result: 证明了雅可比多项式正交基对应的微分矩阵是秩2的半可分矩阵，这一结果扩展了谱方法中微分矩阵结构的理论

Conclusion: 雅可比多项式基的微分矩阵具有秩2的半可分结构，这一发现为设计更好的谱方法提供了理论基础，同时发展的半可分矩阵理论具有更广泛的应用价值

Abstract: The theory of spectral methods for partial differential equations leads to infinite-dimensional matrices which represent the derivative operator with respect to an underlying orthonormal basis. Favourable properties of such differentiation matrices are crucial in the design of good spectral methods. It is known that bases using Laguerre and ultraspherical polynomials lead to semi-separable differentiation matrices of rank 1. In this paper we consider orthonormal bases constructed from Jacobi polynomials and prove that the underlying differentiation matrices are semi-separable of rank 2. This requires new results on semi-separable matrices which might be interesting in a wider context.

</details>


### [332] [Non-Intrusive Data-Free Parametric Reduced Order Model for Geometrically Nonlinear Structures](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.07366)
*Alexander Saccani,Paolo Tiso*

Main category: math.NA

TL;DR: 提出一种完全非侵入式的参数化降阶建模框架，用于处理几何非线性结构在几何变化下的参数化分析。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统有限元模拟在几何参数变化时计算成本高昂，需要开发能够高效适应新参数值的参数化降阶模型。

Method: 基于振动模态和模态导数构建方程驱动的Galerkin降阶模型，使用径向基函数插值所有降阶算子，采用两级POD压缩和MAC引导重排序策略获得全局降阶基。

Result: 方法在参数化弯曲面板和机翼盒结构上验证，与高保真模拟结果高度一致，计算成本大幅降低。

Conclusion: 该参数化降阶建模框架能够保持降阶方程的对称性和多项式结构，实现对新参数值的鲁棒高效适应，可直接获得解析参数灵敏度。

Abstract: We present a fully non-intrusive parametric reduced-order modeling (PROM) framework for geometrically nonlinear structures subject to geometric variations. The method builds upon equation-driven Galerkin ROMs constructed from vibration modes and modal-derivative companion vectors, while nonlinear reduced tensors are identified from standard finite element outputs. A database of such ROMs is generated over a set of training samples, and all reduced operators-including the linear stiffness matrix, the quadratic and cubic nonlinear tensors, the Rayleigh damping parameters, and the reduction basis-are interpolated using Radial Basis Functions (RBFs). A global reduced basis is obtained through a two-level POD compression, combined with a MAC-guided reordering strategy to ensure parametric smoothness. The resulting PROM preserves the symmetry and polynomial structure of the reduced equations, enabling robust and efficient adaptation to new parameter values. Analytical parameter sensitivities follow directly from the interpolation model. The approach is demonstrated on a parametrically curved panel and a wing-box with geometric variations, showing excellent agreement with high-fidelity simulations and enabling substantial reductions in computational cost for parametric analyses.

</details>


### [333] [Structure preserving discretization method for 1D and 2D port-Hamiltonian systems using finite differences on staggered grids](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.07406)
*Ignacio Diaz Alastuey,Yann Le Gorrec,Yongxin Wu*

Main category: math.NA

TL;DR: 本文扩展了无限维端口哈密顿系统在交错网格上的有限差分格式，将一维波方程的离散化方法推广到更广泛的系统，并提出了二维情况下仅需两个网格的离散化策略。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有的交错网格有限差分方法主要针对波方程等特定系统，对于包含非微分项的更广泛端口哈密顿系统（如Timoshenko梁方程、Mindlin板模型）缺乏统一的离散化框架。

Method: 1. 在一维情况下，将波方程的离散化方法推广到包含微分和非微分项的互连算子描述的更广泛系统；2. 在二维情况下，提出仅需两个网格的离散化策略，能够处理包含非微分分量的互连算子。

Result: 建立了适用于包含微分和非微分项的无限维端口哈密顿系统的统一离散化框架，能够处理Timoshenko梁方程和Mindlin板模型等更复杂的物理系统。

Conclusion: 提出的离散化方法扩展了交错网格有限差分格式的应用范围，为包含非微分项的无限维端口哈密顿系统提供了有效的数值求解框架。

Abstract: This paper extends previous work on finitedifference schemes over staggered grids for infinite-dimensional port-Hamiltonian systems. In the one-dimensional setting, it generalizes the discretization approach originally developed for the wave equation to a broader class of systems characterized by interconnection operators that include both differential and non-differential terms, such as the Timoshenko beam equation. The paper then introduces a discretization strategy for the two-dimensional case that requires only two grids, thereby accommodating a wider range of systems, including those whose interconnection operators contain non-differential components, such as the Mindlin plate model.

</details>


### [334] [A linear MARS method for three-dimensional interface tracking](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.07524)
*Yunhao Qiu,Qinghai Zhang*

Main category: math.NA

TL;DR: 提出了一种用于三维显式界面追踪的线性MARS方法，该方法通过粘合表面的部分有序集表示界面，并保持三角形网格的$(r,h,θ)$-正则性，适用于任意复杂拓扑和几何的三维连续体。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在三维界面追踪中，需要一种能够处理复杂拓扑和几何结构的方法，同时保持网格质量并准确捕捉界面演化。现有方法在保持网格正则性和处理复杂拓扑方面存在挑战。

Method: 线性MARS方法：1) 用粘合表面的部分有序集表示界面，每个粘合表面用三角形网格近似；2) 在三角形网格上强制实施$(r,h,θ)$-正则性，确保相邻标记点距离在$[rh,h]$范围内且三角形内角不小于$θ$；3) 适用于任意复杂拓扑和几何的三维连续体；4) 在微分同胚和等距流映射下保持运动相位的拓扑结构和几何特征。

Result: 经典基准测试结果表明：1) 新的网格调整算法能有效强制实施$(r,h,θ)$-正则性；2) 线性MARS方法具有高精度和高效率；3) 在拉格朗日和欧拉长度尺度上分别达到二阶和三阶精度。

Conclusion: 提出的线性MARS方法为三维显式界面追踪提供了一种有效的解决方案，能够处理复杂拓扑和几何结构，保持网格质量，并在拉格朗日和欧拉框架下实现高阶精度，具有实际应用价值。

Abstract: For explicit interface tracking in three dimensions, we propose a linear MARS method that (a) represents the interface by a partially ordered set of glued surfaces and approximates each glued surface with a triangular mesh, (b) maintains an $(r,h,θ)$-regularity on each triangular mesh so that the distance between any pair of adjacent markers is within the range $[rh,h]$ and no angle in any triangle is less than $θ$, (c) applies to three-dimensional continua with arbitrarily complex topology and geometry, (d) preserves topological structures and geometric features of moving phases under diffeomorphic and isometric flow maps, and (e) achieves second-order and third-order accuracy in terms of the Lagrangian and Eulerian length scales, respectively. Results of classic benchmark tests verify the effectiveness of the novel mesh adjustment algorithms in enforcing the $(r,h,θ)$-regularity and demonstrate the high accuracy and efficiency of the proposed linear MARS method.

</details>


### [335] [Time-asymptotic behavior of the Boltzmann equation with random inputs in whole space and its stochastic Galerkin approximation](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.07735)
*Shi Jin,Qi Shao,Haitao Wang*

Main category: math.NA

TL;DR: 研究全空间中具有随机不确定性的Boltzmann方程及其随机Galerkin近似，证明了随机变量高阶导数随时间多项式衰减，并应用于分析SG方法的数值误差衰减


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究Boltzmann方程在初始数据和碰撞核具有随机不确定性时的行为，特别是在全空间中的情况，需要理解随机变量对解的影响如何随时间演化

Method: 采用Green函数方法分析Boltzmann方程，研究随机变量高阶导数的时间衰减特性，并将结果应用于随机Galerkin近似方法的误差分析

Result: 证明了随机变量高阶导数随时间呈现多项式衰减，并将这一结果应用于SG系统分析，展示了数值误差随时间多项式衰减的特性

Conclusion: 通过Green函数方法成功分析了随机Boltzmann方程解的随机依赖性衰减，为随机Galerkin方法提供了理论支持，证明了数值误差的长期衰减行为

Abstract: We consider the Boltzmann equation with random uncertainties arising from the initial data and collision kernel in the {\it whole space}, along with their stochastic Galerkin (SG) approximations. By employing Green's function method, we show that, the higher-order derivatives of the solution with respect to the random variable exhibit polynomial decay over time. These results are then applied to analyze the SG method for the SG system and to demonstrate the polynomial decay of the numerical error over time.

</details>

### [336] [A self-driving lab for solution-processed electrochromic thin films](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.05989)
*Selma Dahms,Luca Torresi,Shahbaz Tareq Bandesha,Jan Hansmann,Holger Röhm,Alexander Colsmann,Marco Schott,Pascal Friederich*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: 利用自驱动实验室加速电致变色涂层开发，结合自动化与机器学习优化旋涂工艺参数


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 溶液加工电致变色材料在智能窗户和显示器中应用潜力巨大，但旋涂工艺参数优化复杂且耗时，需要更高效的开发方法

Method: 建立自驱动实验室系统，结合自动化数据采集、图像处理、光谱分析和贝叶斯优化，高效探索旋涂工艺参数空间

Result: 该方法不仅提高了实验通量，还能有针对性地搜索最优工艺参数，显著加速电致变色涂层开发过程

Conclusion: 自驱动实验室方法可推广到多种溶液加工材料，在材料发现和工艺优化方面具有广阔应用前景

Abstract: Solution-processed electrochromic materials offer high potential for energy-efficient smart windows and displays. Their performance varies with material choice and processing conditions. Electrochromic thin film electrodes require a smooth, defect-free coating for optimal contrast between bleached and colored states. The complexity of optimizing the spin-coated electrochromic thin layer poses challenges for rapid development. This study demonstrates the use of self-driving laboratories to accelerate the development of electrochromic coatings by coupling automation with machine learning. Our system combines automated data acquisition, image processing, spectral analysis, and Bayesian optimization to explore processing parameters efficiently. This approach not only increases throughput but also enables a pointed search for optimal processing parameters. The approach can be applied to various solution-processed materials, highlighting the potential of self-driving labs in enhancing materials discovery and process optimization.

</details>


### [337] [Memory-Amortized Inference: A Topological Unification of Search, Closure, and Structure](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.05990)
*Xin Li*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: MAI框架通过代数拓扑统一学习与记忆，提出同调奇偶原理：偶维同调编码稳定内容，奇维同调编码动态上下文，实现从搜索到查找的拓扑相变。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 当前机器学习将参数静态结构与推理动态流程分离，缺乏生物认知的样本效率和热力学经济性。需要统一学习与记忆的理论框架。

Method: 提出记忆摊销推理(MAI)框架，基于代数拓扑，核心是同调奇偶原理。通过拓扑三位一体变换：搜索→闭包→结构，将高复杂度递归搜索转化为低复杂度查找。

Result: 建立了拓扑循环闭包机制，将NPSPACE复杂度的搜索转化为P复杂度的动态规划。提出拓扑泛化的Wake-Sleep算法作为坐标下降优化过程。

Conclusion: MAI为快思考（直觉）从慢思考（推理）中涌现提供了严格解释，为后图灵架构提供了基于拓扑共振的计算蓝图。

Abstract: Contemporary ML separates the static structure of parameters from the dynamic flow of inference, yielding systems that lack the sample efficiency and thermodynamic frugality of biological cognition. In this theoretical work, we propose \textbf{Memory-Amortized Inference (MAI)}, a formal framework rooted in algebraic topology that unifies learning and memory as phase transitions of a single geometric substrate. Central to our theory is the \textbf{Homological Parity Principle}, which posits a fundamental dichotomy: even-dimensional homology ($H_{even}$) physically instantiates stable \textbf{Content} (stable scaffolds or ``what''), while odd-dimensional homology ($H_{odd}$) instantiates dynamic \textbf{Context} (dynamic flows or ``where''). We derive the logical flow of MAI as a topological trinity transformation: \textbf{Search $\to$ Closure $\to$ Structure}. Specifically, we demonstrate that cognition operates by converting high-complexity recursive search (modeled by \textit{Savitch's Theorem} in NPSPACE) into low-complexity lookup (modeled by \textit{Dynamic Programming} in P) via the mechanism of \textbf{Topological Cycle Closure}. We further show that this consolidation process is governed by a topological generalization of the Wake-Sleep algorithm, functioning as a coordinate descent that alternates between optimizing the $H_{odd}$ flow (inference/wake) and condensing persistent cycles into the $H_{even}$ scaffold (learning/sleep). This framework offers a rigorous explanation for the emergence of fast-thinking (intuition) from slow-thinking (reasoning) and provides a blueprint for post-Turing architectures that compute via topological resonance.

</details>


### [338] [Deep learning recognition and analysis of Volatile Organic Compounds based on experimental and synthetic infrared absorption spectra](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.06059)
*Andrea Della Valle,Annalisa D'Arco,Tiziana Mancini,Rosanna Mosetti,Maria Chiara Paolozzi,Stefano Lupi,Sebastiano Pilati,Andrea Perali*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: 该研究提出了一种结合实验数据和条件生成神经网络合成光谱的方法，用于训练能够准确识别9种VOCs及其浓度的判别神经网络，适用于实时VOC监测设备。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 挥发性有机化合物(VOCs)对人类健康构成重大风险，需要准确检测以监控和减少暴露。红外光谱虽然能超灵敏检测低浓度VOCs，但光谱复杂性限制了实时识别和定量分析的可能性。深度神经网络需要大量训练数据，而实验数据集通常有限。

Method: 1. 创建9种不同类别化合物的实验VOC数据集，包含不同浓度的红外吸收光谱；2. 使用条件生成神经网络生成合成光谱，增加光谱数量和浓度多样性；3. 利用增强的数据集训练稳健的判别神经网络。

Result: 训练出的神经网络能够可靠地识别9种VOCs，并精确预测其浓度。该方法解决了实验数据有限的问题，提高了模型性能。

Conclusion: 该方法成功实现了VOCs的准确识别和浓度预测，训练好的神经网络适合集成到VOC识别和分析的传感设备中，为实时VOC监测提供了有效解决方案。

Abstract: Volatile Organic Compounds (VOCs) are organic molecules that have low boiling points and therefore easily evaporate into the air. They pose significant risks to human health, making their accurate detection the crux of efforts to monitor and minimize exposure. Infrared (IR) spectroscopy enables the ultrasensitive detection at low-concentrations of VOCs in the atmosphere by measuring their IR absorption spectra. However, the complexity of the IR spectra limits the possibility to implement VOC recognition and quantification in real-time. While deep neural networks (NNs) are increasingly used for the recognition of complex data structures, they typically require massive datasets for the training phase. Here, we create an experimental VOC dataset for nine different classes of compounds at various concentrations, using their IR absorption spectra. To further increase the amount of spectra and their diversity in term of VOC concentration, we augment the experimental dataset with synthetic spectra created via conditional generative NNs. This allows us to train robust discriminative NNs, able to reliably identify the nine VOCs, as well as to precisely predict their concentrations. The trained NN is suitable to be incorporated into sensing devices for VOCs recognition and analysis.

</details>


### [339] [When Privacy Isn't Synthetic: Hidden Data Leakage in Generative AI Models](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.06062)
*S. M. Mustaqim,Anantaa Kotal,Paul H. Yi*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: 提出一种基于聚类和结构重叠的黑盒成员推理攻击，通过分析合成数据中的高密度区域来推断训练样本的成员信息，即使在差分隐私保护下仍存在泄露风险。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 生成模型被广泛用于创建隐私保护的合成数据，但现有方法可能仍会通过数据流形的结构重叠泄露训练样本信息。需要探索这种被忽视的攻击面。
